summary.title: Cloud Hub is Now Generally Available
summary.summary: The Cloud Hub platform has reached general availability, offering a new way to manage your cloud resources. Explore its capabilities and streamline your operations today.

2025-11-14.content: You can now view [Active Assist cost optimization recommendations](https://docs.cloud.google.com/hub/docs/optimize) in Cloud Hub is now in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Active Assist cost optimization recommendations available in Cloud Hub
summary.summary: Cloud cost optimization recommendations are now available for preview in Cloud Hub.

2025-10-27.content:
All scheduled and started maintenance activities are now listed together on
the [Maintenance page](https://docs.cloud.google.com/hub/docs/maintenance). You can use the
more\_vert **Settings** menu for scheduled
activities that you can modify.

summary.title: Maintenance Updates
summary.summary: All scheduled and started maintenance activities are now consolidated on the Maintenance page. Use the Settings menu for modifiable scheduled activities.
